well Spacious library with over 10,000 books and journals. with free wifi and e-books access
Books can be issued using your student ID at the library counter.
You can issue up to 3 books at a time and late submission fines apply.
Library has Free Wi-Fi , Self Study Area and computer access along with E-book access.
Contact the librarian in Learning Center for more info.
campus facilities include Wi-Fi, Special labs, Library, sports complex, cafeteria, and medical center.
Campus has Wi-Fi, sports complex, cafeteria, and medical center.
Library has Free Wi-Fi , Self Study Area and computer access along with E-book access.

Parking is available for students with proper licence for both bikes and cars.
special labs are open from 9am to 6pm for student to engage them with project.
Sports facilities include football, basketball, and gym.

patterns: what are the companies visiting for placements
responses: We have best Placement with Top recruiters Like TCS, Infosys, Wipro , Accenture etc...
Placement cell organizes training and interviews. Contact placement officers in T&p cell for more info.
Internships are mandatory for final year students.
Placement statistics are updated every month through mail.
top companies visiting for placements include TCS, Infosys, Wipro, Accenture, and more.
we have best hostel facitity with minimal infrastructure and good food.
Hostel fee: ₹1,25,000/year approximately along with mess charges.
Hostel has 24/7 security and Wi-Fi.
Contact Hostel Incharge: Mr. Ravi for more details.
Hostel timings: Entry allowed till 10pm, lights out by 11pm.
Hostel rules include no visitors after 8pm and maintaining cleanliness.
hostel rooms are furnished with basic amenities and shared bathrooms. and can be shared by 4 students without ac and 2 students with ac.
college bus facility is available from major city points.
bus timing: Morning and evening shifts available.
Bus routes cover all major city areas.
College buses run from 7am to 7pm. Bus timings are displayed at the main gate.
transport facility includes buses with automatic closure and biometric attendance.
Contact Transport Incharge: Mr. Ravi for more details or Transport office can help with queries..
Yes,Scholarships are available for meritorious students.

Apply for scholarships before 30th September.
Scholarship amount varies by category. Please contact the scholarship office in Research Center
Eligibility: 75% marks in Board exams and Student with financial need
Admissions start from 1st June, Contact the admission office for more info.
Admission start from 1st June and ends on 31st August.
You can apply for admission online through the college website.
Admission process includes apply councelling for merit students or direct admission based on management quota.
Admission forms are available online.
Eligibility: 50% marks in qualifying exam.

student support includes academic and personal counseling.
Grievances can be submitted online.
Counseling services are available for all students.
Mental health support is confidential and free.

Why did the student eat his homework? 
 Because the teacher said it was a piece of cake!

Why was the math book sad? 
Because it had too many problems.

Why don't scientists trust atoms?
 Because they make up everything!

Why did the scarecrow win an award?
 Because he was outstanding in his field!

Why did the bicycle fall over?
 Because it was two-tired!

Why did the computer go to the doctor?
 Because it had a virus!

Why did the student bring a ladder to school?
 Because they wanted to go to high school!

Why did the cookie go to the nurse?
 Because it felt crummy!

Why did the music teacher go to jail?
 Because she got caught with too many sharp objects!

Why did the student bring a pencil to the party?
 Because they wanted to draw some attention!
